description: Driver Disqualification - Update DD screen.
Warrant issued - Update Wanted/Missing
Order Issues - Update Wanted/Missing, check and amend Disposal
Convicted of Sexual Offence or Sexual Order made - Update Markers and Register(s) as appropriate
Defendant remanded in custody - update custody history
Defendant imprisoned - update custody history
Defendant dead - update death marker
Defendant has breached bail - Update breach of bail marker
Bail conditions imposed/varied/cancelled - update remand screen
Warrant not executed/Withdrawn - update Wanted/Missing screen
Too many offences - manual update
Personal details changed
Forfeiture order made - update records as appropriate
Adjourned Sine Die - update case details
Update offence date(s) on PNC
Remanded in custody with bail direction
Update original case with conviction and sentence details
Disqualification or Revocation Order made (not motoring)
Extradition ordered or Proceedings pending
Domestic Violence Case
Vulnerable or Intimidated victim/witness
Original case has been re-opened/stat dec made - check new sentence details
Driving disqualification suspended
Out of Area case
Trigger only case reallocated from another force
Civil proceedings granted or Order made - update records as appropriate
Pre-charge bail application
Confirm address on PNC
Disposal text was truncated - revise on PNC if wanted
Split Adjournment - manual split required
Enter details of curfew order
Offence added to the PNC - Update MO Screen/Offence Location/Update 3042
Offence added at court - add to PNC
Offences taken into consideration - add to offence
